Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is bears traces of a dark-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a pale-red slip and remains of two lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394200) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394200)
